change.changenote: Section 1 BEFORE amended by BC Reg 379/2012, effective March 18, 2013.

section.sectiontext: This regulation applies in respect of proceedings before the Provincial Court under the Family Relations Act in which an order for child custody, access, guardianship or support is sought or in which variation of such an order is sought.

change.changenote: Section 2 (1) BEFORE amended by BC Reg 27/2013, effective January 30, 2013.

subsection.subsectiontext: The Chief Judge of the Provincial Court may give directions requiring parties in proceedings to attend parenting programs operated by the Ministry of Attorney General.

change.changenote: Section 2 (1) BEFORE amended by BC Reg 99/2018, effective May 18, 2018.

bcl:subsection.bcl:text: The Chief Judge of the Provincial Court may give directions requiring parties in proceedings to attend parenting programs operated by the Ministry of Justice.
